sourcesContent:
import './App.css';
import { Flex, Input, Grid, Center, GridItem, Button, useDisclosure} from '@chakra-ui/react'
// import { ColorModeScript} from "@cha"
import NavBar from './components/navbar';
import DataContext from "./context/DataContext";
import { useContext, useState } from 'react';
import { ArrowLeftIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons';
import {
  Modal,
  ModalOverlay,
  ModalContent,
  ModalHeader,
  ModalFooter,
  ModalBody,
  ModalCloseButton,
} from '@chakra-ui/react'


function App() {
  let {lightMode, data } = useContext(DataContext)
  let [mode , setMode] = useState("123")

  let { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()

  return (
    <Flex w="100%" h="100svh"  justify="center" align="center" bg="white">
      <Flex maxW="480px" w="100%" maxH="896px" h="100%" direction="column" >
        <NavBar modal={onOpen}/>
        <Flex direction="column" justify="space-between" h="100%" bg={lightMode?"":"#1a202c"}>
          <Flex h="25%" >

          </Flex>
          <Flex h="60%" >
            <Flex w="75%" bg={lightMode?"#ebf0fa":"#0f1726"} borderTopLeftRadius="15px" >
              <Grid templateColumns='repeat(3, 1fr)' w="100%" gap="1rem" p="3%" >
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">1</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">2</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">3</Button>
                {/* <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/> */}
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">4</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">5</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">6</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">7</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">8</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">9</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px" onClick={()=>setMode(mode==="ABC"?"123":"ABC")}>{mode ==="ABC"?"123":"ABC"}</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">0</Button>
                <Button className={lightMode? "bttn-light":"bttn-dark"} borderRadius="20px">.</Button>
              </Grid>
            </Flex>
            <Flex borderTopRightRadius="15px" w="25%" bg={lightMode?"#ebf0fa":"#0f1726"} gap="1rem" p="2%" direction="column" justify="space-evenly" fontSize="25px" fontWeight="500">
              {/* <Center bg="white" borderRadius="20px" h="20%">/</Center> */}
              <Button color={lightMode?"black":"white"} colorScheme="red" borderRadius="20px" h="40%">CE</Button>
              <Button color={lightMode?"black":"white"} colorScheme='red' borderRadius="20px" h="40%"><ArrowLeftIcon/></Button>
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Flex>
      </Flex>

      <Modal isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
        <ModalOverlay />
        <ModalContent>
          <ModalHeader>Modal Title</ModalHeader>
          <ModalCloseButton />
          <ModalBody>
            
          </ModalBody>

          <ModalFooter>
            <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
              Close
            </Button>
            <Button variant='ghost'>Secondary Action</Button>
          </ModalFooter>
        </ModalContent>
      </Modal>
    </Flex>
  );
}

export default App;
